HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping for orders over 975,00€ (not applicable to island deliveries or items marked 'Cijena dostave na upit').
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 4-7 business days (can be extended to 7-15 business days for islands or unforeseen circumstances)
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Standard pricing and free shipping do not apply. The cost is calculated manually upon request based on the courier's price list.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The standard pricing table applies, but for specific bulky items (e.g., panels over 4m, pallets over 3m), the price is available on request ("Cijena dostave na upit").
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Standard pricing and free shipping do not apply. The cost is calculated manually upon request based on the courier's price list.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Gutta Hrvatska d.o.o. (skladište), KOBILJAČKA CESTA 102/1, 10361 SESVETSKI KRALJEVAC

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Gutta.hr provides home delivery throughout Croatia and personal pickup from their warehouse in Sesvetski Kraljevac. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not offered.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by GLS, Paket24 Hrvatske pošte, Lagermax, and Quehenberger.
PRICING & DELIVERY TIME: Home delivery costs are tiered based on order value, starting at 7.50€ and going up to 97.50€. Shipping is free for orders over 975.00€. Standard delivery time is 4-7 business days, extending to 7-15 days for bulky items and island deliveries. Personal pickup is free.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A significant restriction is that the standard pricing and free shipping do not apply to island deliveries or certain bulky items marked 'Price on request'; these costs are calculated manually after an inquiry. Cash on delivery (COD) is not available as a payment method.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-organized and detailed on a dedicated page. The tiered pricing structure is clear. The main drawback is the lack of a fixed price list for island deliveries, which requires customers to contact the company for a quote.
